title: The Rumanian, Brancusi
creator_credit: British Council, Arts Council of Great Britain, Sean Hudson and Rodney Wilson
brief_description: This film explores the influence of Romanian sculptor Brancusi’s early childhood environment on his work and life. The director sees the film as “an ethnographic film about an artist”. Concentrates on the major works “Endless Column”, “The Gates of the Kiss” and “The Table of Silence”.
